UCLASS (Blueprintable)  
class ADaySequenceActor :

    public IMovieScenePlaybackClient,  
    public IMovieSceneBindingOwnerInterface

bool bForceDisableDayInterpCurve Used to early out from WarpEvaluationRange.
int32 Bias User-defined bias to apply to sequences in DaySequenceCollection.
TObjectPtr< UMovieSceneBindingOverrides > BindingOverrides Mapping of actors to override the sequence bindings with
bool bOverrideInitialTimeOfDay Editor only override for testing in PIE.
bool bOverrideRunDayCycle Editor only override for testing in PIE.
uint8: 1 bReplicatePlayback If true, playback of this sequence on the server will be synchronized across other clients
bool bRunDayCycle Whether or not to run a day cycle.
bool bUpdateRootSequenceOnTick When true, the root sequence will be updated on next Tick.
bool bUseInterpCurve  
int32 CachedDebugLevel  
TObjectPtr< UCurveFloat > DayInterpCurve User-provided interpolation curve that maps day cycle times to desired cycle times (usually from 0-24 hours).
